definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Our service is free repairs due to a series of bar code barriers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的服务是免费维修条码机出现一系列的障碍问题。

sentences.english: Home electric kitchen utensils made by our factory are easy to use and maintain.
sentences.chinese: 本厂的家用厨房电器，使用方便，维修简易。

sentences.english: Regular maintenance work of the low cost.
sentences.chinese: 经常性的维修保养工作费用较低。

sentences.english: The fighter also carried an astromech droid for onboard repairs.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机上也有宇航技工机器人负责机载维修。

sentences.english: Skilled in the repair and maintenance of refrigeration systems and cold rooms.
sentences.chinese: 精通冷冻系统和冷藏室的维修和保养工作。

sentences.english: To provide round-the-clock technical support and maintenance services.
sentences.chinese: 公司提供技术支持及二十四小时的维修服务。

sentences.english: We will repair or replace free of charge any non-moving part found to be defective.
sentences.chinese: 我们会对有缺陷的非移动部件免费进行维修或更换。

sentences.english: Show the repair quotation and breakdown to insurer before commencing.
sentences.chinese: 维修估价单位必须先交保险公司比准后方可开工修理。

sentences.english: What's more, our factorycan process and repair axletrees.
sentences.chinese: 另外，本厂还承接各种要求的轴芯加工和维修。

sentences.english: SIMCO Scientific Instrument Repair and Calibration Services Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 西高科学仪器维修校准服务有限公司。

sentences.english: Beijing Tongzhou Dong Guan-site computer repair services.
sentences.chinese: 北京通州北关电脑维修上门服务。

sentences.english: The garage has got a high profit.
sentences.chinese: 汽车维修厂的利润很高。

sentences.english: The object of the paper is how to control the maintenance cost of the petroleum enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 本论文的研究对象是辽化公司的设备维修成本控制。

sentences.english: Suspension type thumb nut is used for fastening so that it can be quickly opened up sand downward is conventient for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 采用碟型活节螺栓紧固，能快速向下开启，便于维修。

sentences.english: I happened to see a Shanghai Dazhong service station over here.
sentences.chinese: 我看这边正好有上海大众的维修站。

sentences.english: The products need to re-repair inspection or special treatment of retirement after service time.
sentences.chinese: 产品过了使用期限，需要重新维修检查，或报废处理。

definition: to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to troubleshoot/to check components individually for problems/troubleshooting
